data.actual_result: Only people you have DMed appear in the Member List System Settings: Android 6.0, Sony Xperia M5
data.expected_result: All members of a Group Chat or a Server appear when you open the Member List
data.short_description: Occasionally when clicking a notification, only people you have DMed show up as members of a chat until you click on another server
data.steps_to_repro: - Close Discord - Click a notifiction from a Group Chat or Server
